attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reverse Thrust
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Maelstrom-GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
